data.prayer: Father, help your children in Busia, Uganda find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Busia, Uganda
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Busia, Uganda.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Busia, Uganda to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Busia.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Aringa people. Make the Aringa people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, comfort those who mourn in Busia, Uganda.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Busia with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Busia to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

location.name: Busia
location.people_groups_list: Kalenjin, Pokot, Hindi, Amba, Karamojong, Meneng
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kalenjin, Pokot (134,000), Hindi (5,800), Amba (54,000), Karamojong (849,000), Meneng (7,800)
